title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.4 - Written requests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.4 - Written requests

State Regulations

Written requests to examine public employment records of the
commission will be made on form AC-375 by members of the news media. Such
applications will be submitted to Christine T. Czosek, executive secretary of
the commission, General Donovan State Office Building, 125 Main Street, Buffalo, New York 14203--(716) 842-2047. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1100.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
